verbose_text: Ding et al found that AIV downregulated aldose reductase activity, prevented ERK1/2 phosphorylation and decreased the activity of cytokines, such as nuclear factor (NF)-kappaB, and significantly decreased retinal ganglion cell apoptosis in db/db mice with DR, relieved retinal ganglion cell dysfunction, which proved that AS-IV exerted a certain preventive effect against DR.
evidence: Ding et al found that AIV downregulated aldose reductase
